pages.text:
RiverFront RV Park and Marina
A relaxed RV park offering 31 full hook-up sites (30 & 50 amp), on-site laundry facilities, and a fishing dock for guests to enjoy.
Welcome to RiverFront RV Park and Marina
A beautiful riverside retreat just outside Jacksonville, Florida, where the St. Johns River flows toward the Atlantic Ocean. Nestled within the breathtaking Timucuan Preserve, our RV park offers a peaceful, quiet escape surrounded by natural beauty.
Park Guidelines:
Adults Only
– Guests must be 21 or older. Exceptions are made for weekends and holidays.
Pet Policy
– We welcome cats and well-behaved dogs. No other pets allowed.
RV Age Limit
– All RVs must be 10 years old or newer.
Long-Term stays only.
Minimum stay is one month.
Rates start at $850 per month
, with free utilities and Wi-Fi included.
Welcome to RiverFront RV Park and Marina
A beautiful riverside retreat just outside Jacksonville, Florida, where the St. Johns River flows toward the Atlantic Ocean. Nestled within the breathtaking Timucuan Preserve, our RV park offers a peaceful, quiet escape surrounded by natural beauty.
Park Guidelines:
Adults Only
– Guests must be 21 or older. Exceptions are made for weekends and holidays.
Pet Policy
– We welcome cats and well-behaved dogs. No other pets allowed.
RV Age Limit
– All RVs must be 10 years old or newer.
Long-Term stays only.
Minimum stay is one month.
Rates start at $850 per month
, with free utilities and Wi-Fi included.
Come enjoy a quiet, nature-filled RV lifestyle just minutes from the city
– but a world away in feel.
A quiet RV Park and water front marina wrapped around the
Timucuan Ecological Preserve
Take a short drive up the coast through the beautiful Timucuan Preserve to spend the afternoon at the
Amelia Island
the
Fernand beach
to enjoy a wonderful day excursion, or rest at your RV along the water front. Rest, relax and enjoy the quiet life in Florida.

Contact us
Riverfront RV Park and Marina is quiet place to rest and enjoy life.
Ways to get in touch
Need help with a Booking?

Give us a call
Send us an email
Feedback
“Great RV Park on the water! Good reasonable prices! Great fishing dock! Look forward to staying sometime soon
!”
– Susan
“It is quiet and has great views. Fishing and crabbing from the pier. Just a few miles from the Ferry, The Jetties, Little and Big Talbot Island and so much more.”
– Lynne
“This is the perfect spot on the river to enjoy a great day, week…..to just live the good life. Pleasant management, great campers looking out for one another.”
– Robert
